articles.title: About
articles.description: My personal blog about R, Python and data science
articles.contents:
I hope to use this blog as a tool for self learning and documentation as I try to expand my skills and knowledge of data science.
Iâ€™m sure there will be many ways I can improve upon what I post here, and I would really welcome any feedback or suggestions. You can message me on twitter , linkedin or find me on github
